name: choco-pack
description: Runs Chocolatey Pack with specified parameters
author: gep13

inputs.name: operation
inputs.label: How many nuspec files?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to pack a single nuspec file, or multiple.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the nuspec file(s).

inputs.name: nuspecFileName
inputs.label: NuSpec File Name.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file name of the NuSpec File that should be packed.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version you would like to insert into the package.

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location where the generated nupkg(s) should be placed.

inputs.name: pushPackages
inputs.label: Push generated nupkg(s).
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the generated nupkg(s) also be pushed to the

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source to push the generated nupkg(s) to.

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API Key that should be used to push the nupkg(s) to specified source.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The time, in seconds, to allow a package push to occur before timing out.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Show verbose messaging.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Very verbose messaging, avoid using under normal circumstances.

inputs.name: trace
inputs.label: Show trace messaging.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Very, very verbose trace messaging. Avoid except when needing super low-level .NET Framework debugging.

inputs.name: extraArguments
inputs.label: Extra Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Chocolatey Arguments that are not catered for above.
